nodes.bodyText: This seems like something Sakai should be doing more regularly and would even go as far to say if there are any active sak-banner-error, sak-banner-warn, sak-banner-success should probably be doing this everywhere? If so should this go in headscript?
Don't think so, this only affects the JSF tools that use the h:messages tag using the table layout, I think is fine resolving the issue here.
